short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your cold emailing game, seamlessly crafting effective cold emails in two clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write effective cold emails in seconds—powered by generative AI and personalized for you.

ColdCraft is the ultimate solution to streamline your outreach efforts. Whether you're a budding investment banker trying to get an interview or a seasoned consultant looking to expand your connections, ColdCraft is your go-to tool for crafting compelling cold emails effortlessly.

➤ Seamless Integration

ColdCraft easily integrates into Gmail, GCal, and Linkedin. You can star potential contacts in LinkedIn and choose to directly reach out or save to Gmail. You have full control over the tone and length, and can choose to auto-attach time slots at the bottom of your email if you are aiming for a coffee chat. 

➤ Personalization Made Simple

Prompted by your bullet points, ColdCraft finds connections between your resume and your recipient’s Linkedin. The availability feature finds 30-min time slots in the next seven days, looking for a slot in the morning, afternoon, and evening.

➤ Enhanced Productivity

With ColdCraft, you can reclaim valuable time to focus on what matters most—preparing for interviews, developing your technicals and behaviorals, and coffee chatting more cool people.

➤ Get Started Today

Join our community which have transformed their cold emailing experience with ColdCraft. Download the ColdCraft Chrome extension now and take your outreach efforts to new heights.
